points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
points.analysis: Linkedin can, for example, take all information from calendar, email, places of event, people involved if you synchronize your calendar or email.

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des détails sur les types d'informations personnelles qu'il collecte
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: no spidering or crawling

case.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
case.localized_title: pas de spidering ou de crawling

points.title: You can delete your content from this service

case.title: You can delete your content from this service
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez supprimer votre contenu de ce service
case.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.

points.title: Users are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.

case.title: You are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs ne sont pas autorisés à utiliser des pseudonymes, car la confiance et la transparence entre les utilisateurs en ce qui concerne leur identité sont importantes pour le service.
case.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed, but it makes sense for the purposes of this service.

points.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

case.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
case.localized_title: Ce service ignore l'en-tête Do Not Track (DNT) et suit les utilisateurs même s'ils ont activé cet en-tête.
case.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

points.title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services

case.title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services
case.localized_title: Ce service peut utiliser votre contenu pour tous ses services existants et futurs.

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

case.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
case.localized_title: Le service peut vendre ou transférer d'une autre manière vos données personnelles dans le cadre d'une procédure de faillite ou d'un autre type de transaction financière.
case.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

points.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
points.analysis: Full quote: "You own all of the content, feedback and personal information you provide to us"

case.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
case.localized_title: Si vous proposez des suggestions au service, celui-ci peut les utiliser sans votre accord ni compensation, mais il n'en devient pas propriétaire.
case.description: The service may employ a broad copyright license over feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted, including the right to use them without restriction, compensation or obligation to the user, but they do not claim ownership on them.

points.title: You maintain ownership of your content
points.analysis: Full quote: "You own all of the content, feedback and personal information you provide to us"

case.title: You maintain ownership of your content
case.localized_title: Vous restez propriétaire de votre contenu
case.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.

points.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

case.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
case.localized_title: Vous autorisez le service à débiter une carte de crédit fournie sur une base récurrente.
case.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.

points.title: Alternative accounts are not allowed

case.title: Alternative accounts are not allowed
case.localized_title: Les comptes alternatifs ne sont pas autorisés
case.description:
Services that do not allow multiple or alternative accounts are covered by this case.
Alternative accounts can contribute to an increased privacy, but can also be used to manipulate discussions and polls and might decrease the trustworthiness of a person.

points.title: This service is only available to users over 16 years of age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service est réservé aux utilisateurs âgés de plus de 16 ans.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

case.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
case.localized_title: Le fournisseur de services ne garantit pas un service ininterrompu, opportun, sûr ou exempt d'erreurs.
case.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service transmet vos données personnelles à des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Des informations sont fournies sur la manière dont vos données personnelles sont utilisées
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user or $1000

case.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
case.localized_title: Toute responsabilité au nom du service est limitée aux frais que vous avez payés en tant qu'utilisateur ou à 1000 $.

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

case.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
case.localized_title: Le service est fourni "en l'état" et doit être utilisé aux seuls risques des utilisateurs.
case.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.localized_title: Vous avez le droit de quitter ce service à tout moment
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: Your personal data is used for advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont utilisées à des fins publicitaires
case.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

case.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
case.localized_title: Ce service ne garantit pas que lui-même ou les produits obtenus par son intermédiaire répondent à vos attentes ou à vos exigences
case.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.

points.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

case.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period
case.localized_title: Le service peut conserver un enregistrement sécurisé et anonyme de vos données à des fins d'analyse, même après la période de conservation des données.
case.description: The data retention period states how long a service keeps user data. In this case, the service may anonymize the personal data after its retention period is over and use it for analytical or research purposes.

points.title: This service tracks you on other websites

case.title: This service tracks you on other websites
case.localized_title: Ce service vous suit sur d'autres sites web
case.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour la publicité
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

case.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
case.localized_title: Les pixels de suivi sont utilisés dans la communication entre les services et les utilisateurs.
case.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

case.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
case.localized_title: Certains contenus peuvent être supprimés sans raison et sans préavis.
case.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.

points.title: Copyright license limited for the purposes of that same service but transferable and sublicenseable

case.title: Copyright license limited for the purposes of that same service but transferable and sublicenseable
case.localized_title: Licence de droit d'auteur limitée aux fins de ce même service, mais transférable et pouvant faire l'objet d'une sous-licence.

points.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Les informations vous concernant sont recueillies par des tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

case.title: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs
case.localized_title: Ce service n'assume aucune responsabilité pour les pertes ou les dommages résultant de toute question relative au service.
case.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

points.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

case.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
case.localized_title: Les tiers utilisés par le service sont soumis à des obligations de confidentialité
case.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.

points.title: First-party cookies are used

case.title: First-party cookies are used
case.localized_title: Utilisation de cookies de première partie
case.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

points.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

case.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
case.localized_title: Ce service reçoit votre position précise grâce aux coordonnées GPS
case.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.

points.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

case.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
case.localized_title: Vous devez indiquer votre nom légal, les pseudonymes ne sont pas autorisés.
case.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed. This case doesn't apply to Services for which transparency regarding users identities is relevant for their purposes.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies de première partie peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
